CustomField.description: BODEV-1134: Calculate days since Past Account Original Contract Start Date till Current Job Start Date
CustomField.formula: IF( OR( ISBLANK( UG_Current_Job_Start_Date__c ), ISBLANK( UG_Past_Acc_Original_Cont_Start_Date__c ) ), NULL, UG_Current_Job_Start_Date__c - UG_Past_Acc_Original_Cont_Start_Date__c )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Calculate days since Past Account Original Contract Start Date till Current Job Start Date
CustomField.label: UG - Days b/w Past Cont. Start & Move
